polynomial

Interface Polynomial

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolynomialImpl

    public interface Polynomial
    This class represents the methods to create a polynomial list. It allows the user to add terms, get the maximum degree of the polynomial, get the coefficient of a certain term in the polynomial based on the degree, evaluate with a given number, take the derivative of, and add two polynomials together.
